title: Rose Johnson • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #154
itunes:title: Rose Johnson • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #154
itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with writer, comic, actor, sketco and Birthday Girl ROSE JOHNSON!
description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with writer, comic, actor, sketco and Birthday Girl ROSE JOHNSON!


A pure treat for you this week as Rose rocks the afterlife (or not afterlife) with grace and finesse. She and Brett get down to the whole bit, including no bitching in heaven, toes, the wide world of commercial acting (including audio examples), the sad backdrop and the mechanics of the self-tape, from Devon to the big lights, writing a book in lockdown, nature’s television, not enjoying a scare, and family dynamics. Action packed and super fun - you are sure to enjoy Rose!
